ValidationRule.description: Prevents Cases from being assigned to one of these specific Sales Leaders and Inactive users.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISCHANGED(OwnerId),
OR( Owner:User.Full_Name__c = 'Kathy Mayerhofer', Owner:User.Full_Name__c = 'Melissa Wainer', Owner:User.Full_Name__c = 'Jeff Klein', Owner:User.IsActive = False ),
!$Permission.SalesCase, !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The chosen Owner cannot own Cases. The Opp Owner maybe deactivated.
